title.value: Transforms the DK-HL7 Questionnaire Form Definition Document (QFDD) to an eHealth Questionnaire resource. The input FHIR DocumentReference contains QFDD XML for the DK-HL7 Questionnaire Form Definition Document. The returned Bundle contains the eHealth Questionnaire and Composition resource which reference the returned eHealth Questionnaire.

description.value: Transforms the DK-HL7 Questionnaire Form Definition Document (QFDD) to an eHealth Questionnaire resource. The input FHIR DocumentReference contains QFDD XML for the DK-HL7 Questionnaire Form Definition Document. The returned Bundle contains the eHealth Questionnaire and Composition resource which reference the returned eHealth Questionnaire.
